question: What is the measurement of Line_G_F_0?
qt_description: Line Line_G_F_0 (Description: Extend line L5 to perpendicular foot F_0)
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 5-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 5, rotation angle pi/5 radians. Total 2 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Circumscribed 5-sided polygon (center O1). Round 2: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Inscribed 5-sided polygon (center O1). Found 11 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 0 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 10, total arcs: 0, total points: 11.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Draw perpendicular from point B to line L5 (foot F_0 on extension)

gt.expr: sqrt(10)*sqrt(-sqrt(5 - sqrt(5))*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5) + 10)*sqrt(-5*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5) + sqrt(5)*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5) + 6*sqrt(5 - sqrt(5)))*(-63*sqrt(5 - sqrt(5))*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5) - 94*sqrt(5) + 21*sqrt(5)*sqrt(5 - sqrt(5))*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5) + 282)*sqrt(-190*sqrt(2)*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5) - 152*sqrt(5 - sqrt(5))*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5) - 85*sqrt(10)*sqrt(5 - sqrt(5)) - 170*sqrt(5) + 85*sqrt(2)*sqrt(5 - sqrt(5)) + 38*sqrt(5)*sqrt(5 - sqrt(5))*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5) + 680 + 114*sqrt(10)*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5))/(128*sqrt(-7137065*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5) - 1964180*sqrt(5)*sqrt(5 - sqrt(5)) + 4419405*sqrt(5 - sqrt(5)) + 3184229*sqrt(5)*sqrt(sqrt(5) + 5)))

api_results:
In the given geometric construction, a regular pentagon centered at O1 with side length 5 is first circumscribed by another regular pentagon (also centered at O1), and then a third regular pentagon is inscribed within the second, again centered at O1. This yields a total of 11 labeled points and 10 line segments. In a subsequent enhancement step, a perpendicular is drawn from vertex B to the extension of line L5, meeting it at foot point F_0. Point G lies on the same line L5, between F_0 and F. 

What is the measurement of segment GF₀?
